title: 11 "The Blood Rain of the One Hundred Foxes of Shinshu - Part I"(Japanese:「信州百狐血雨地獄」〜第二段〜) December 10, 1999(1999-12-10)
transformers_text: 11 The Blood Rain of the One Hundred Foxes of Shin shu Part I Japanese December 10 1999 1999 12 10 Sakon is invited by the Akizuki family to give a Bunraku performance After the performance the head of the family So u ichiro u Akizuki receives a call and suddenly leaves Meanwhile Sakon is told that there have been slasher killings in the nearby village and Akizuki's eldest son K you ichi is the main suspect He has gone missing with an apparently cursed By akko sword A few hours later another call is received saying that So u ichiro u has been murdered by his own son
tf_idf_text: blood rain one hundred fox shin shu part japanese december sakon invite akizuki family give bunraku performance performance head family ichiro akizuki receive call suddenly leave meanwhile sakon tell slasher killing nearby village akizukis eldest son ichi main suspect go miss apparently curse akko sword hour later another call receive say ichiro murder son
